In this note, I will discuss more details about the post-prior equivalence in IAV model with specific detalied discussion on the EBU with T-matrix form. The key equation of the IAV model is 
$$
[E_x-T_x -U_x] \psi^{(+)}_x(r_x) = \rho (r_x)
$$
